short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: It helps to keep roles of people and groups, to generate auto will from what you noted. It helps you to solve the mistery!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension is a helper for Town of Salem web based game. It helps to keep game progress easily and solve the mistery. You can easily note roles of role groups and peoples depending on game mode. It generates will text based on you noted and let you copy to your last will in the game. 

Changelog:
# [0.3] - 2016-11-30
- Role table format in will is changed to make it more readable
